attributes.action: Reduce MP remunerations by one half.
attributes.additional_details: They do not deserve to avoid the financial pain and losses being inflicted upon those who voted and finance them.
attributes.background: Government should reduce the remuneration of Members of Parliament by one half and retrospectively from taking office after the last General Election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
